"{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":49078,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b0072d97-f3cb-46d7-81bd-dc00400cdf86/ghjkl.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b0072d97-f3cb-46d7-81bd-dc00400cdf86/ghjkl.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"ghjkl.PNG\",\"name\":\"ghjkl.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b0072d97-f3cb-46d7-81bd-dc00400cdf86\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":150.4428672817601},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":4526,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6fb49b29-5d44-4ebb-ab3e-b8205851f95d/olol.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6fb49b29-5d44-4ebb-ab3e-b8205851f95d/olol.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"olol.PNG\",\"name\":\"olol.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6fb49b29-5d44-4ebb-ab3e-b8205851f95d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":308,\"height\":35},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A request has been received by DL HR NINJA TEAM;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rHR consulting lead (Viktoriia Mitrofanova) contacts the customer and defines who can work with the request, minimum 2 HR drivers are assigned to the request;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rHR Consulting lead writes a reply to the customer informing them that we will contact them within 3 days;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rOne HR driver is a PM, the second HR driver helps with implementation;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAn application is entered into the Trello HR Ninja Team with the indication of the request drivers, then all the activities are tracked in Trello.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":7700,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c563096e-d790-4d8c-aeb3-5d39ac6c6dcd/olkjk.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c563096e-d790-4d8c-aeb3-5d39ac6c6dcd/olkjk.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"olkjk.PNG\",\"name\":\"olkjk.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c563096e-d790-4d8c-aeb3-5d39ac6c6dcd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":575,\"height\":42},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"During the meeting HR drivers discuss the request from the account, the main purpose of the meeting is to identify key problems and set goals. You can offer to record a call if there is no sensitive information from customers. To hold a meeting, we recommend using the materials on primary preparation on the relevant \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epam-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/p/viktoriia_mitrofanova/EoKrq4FdyytOgdmzSz1OBXMBC4CWRM5tgwVcEedE8VgI7g?e=ePYZwg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"folder\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\";\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rHR shall agree with the customer which part of work will go further - a repeated sync with details is sent to the calendar, or the team takes up to 2 weeks to work out the action plan + the plan is sent to the customer;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe details of the meeting are written as meeting follow-up after the meeting;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rFor the first meeting, we prepare a presentation with project metrics (create a presentation template), which in the future can be edited and compared in dynamics (before-became) based on the Project Analysis tab;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAdditional HRs are not involved in the first introductory meeting, additional HRs get engaged into the process at the next stage. The decision on the possibility of including an additional HR into the project team is made by Viktoriia Mitrofanova;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe status is updated in Trello and the deadline is indicated by ViktoriiaÂ Mitrofanova.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":8759,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f9c7152b-f796-4afd-b6de-fd772f8b1676/03ff.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f9c7152b-f796-4afd-b6de-fd772f8b1676/03ff.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"03ff.PNG\",\"name\":\"03ff.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f9c7152b-f796-4afd-b6de-fd772f8b1676\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":675,\"height\":40},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Defining the upper-level scope of tasks based on the goals and issues of the request;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAgreeing on members of the working group;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rPreparing a presentation for the customer with an upper-level task scope;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe status is updated in Trello and the deadline is indicated.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6647,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b4a53a4c-d7ac-48a4-bc66-c79136df9d5f/04ggg.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b4a53a4c-d7ac-48a4-bc66-c79136df9d5f/04ggg.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"04ggg.PNG\",\"name\":\"04ggg.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b4a53a4c-d7ac-48a4-bc66-c79136df9d5f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":497,\"height\":44},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The meeting takes place with the HR drivers of the request and the customer;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe work plan outlined in the presentation is discussed together with the customer;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe work plan gets adjusted based on the customer's wishes;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe tasks are prioritized in case there are many tasks and directions;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThis is followed by a detailed discussion on who will be responsible for each task and who will be the contact person on the part of the customer;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe meeting is recorded if there is such an opportunity;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe status is updated in Trello and the deadline is indicated.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":6911,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5598053d-86f1-4120-9b49-e165ef9a75d1/05kkkk.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5598053d-86f1-4120-9b49-e165ef9a75d1/05kkkk.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"05kkkk.PNG\",\"name\":\"05kkkk.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5598053d-86f1-4120-9b49-e165ef9a75d1\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":546,\"height\":47},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The project documentation gets prepared and, as an option, a developed template is used (an example of a work plan is on the main page with materials). The project is broken down into tasks, a responsible person is assigned for each task and deadlines are negotiated;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe project documentation is posted in the project shared folder, that includes the presentation with metrics and the work plan;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe general project documentation is sent to the customer for approval;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe meeting is recorded if there is such an opportunity;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe status is updated in Trello and the deadline is indicated.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":7012,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/fbf7adc0-d7e7-49f0-a723-ceaa2f3287e8/06Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/fbf7adc0-d7e7-49f0-a723-ceaa2f3287e8/06Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"06Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"06Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"fbf7adc0-d7e7-49f0-a723-ceaa2f3287e8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":526,\"height\":44},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the process of realization, it is necessary to agree on the sprints of work, how often the syncs will be held to discuss progress and the status of work, and how new meetings will be approved;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAfter discussing each task, we set deadlines and assign a responsible person, we send an MFY or a separate table with a general list of tasks - a work plan for the request;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe ask the customer what format they would like to see the results in (presentation, plate, etc.);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe status is updated in Trello and the deadline is indicated.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5920,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/519fd823-67e2-4a70-a1c3-cb1e6615b70a/07Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/519fd823-67e2-4a70-a1c3-cb1e6615b70a/07Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"07Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"07Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"519fd823-67e2-4a70-a1c3-cb1e6615b70a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":464,\"height\":50},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A retrospective is held after each large completed task. At the retrospective meeting with the customer, we present the results of the work done and ask them to fill out the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=0HIbtJ9OJkyKaflJ82fJHXKE0nXoCnRHiL17wC3WCA5UQ09TUU5ZUVowS0wxOVJEWEtVNU5MWVRVSy4u\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"feedback form\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". We send an email with a questionnaire form from the general DL HR Ninja Team. The letter is sent by the person who led the work on the project;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rIn retrospective, we discuss with the customer what actions they are going to take based on the results of the work (depends on what we did for them);\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe will present the feedback from the project team in case it has been received;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe  discuss the sum up/final meeting on the task and in what format this meeting needs to be held;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HR specialists analyze the feedback at a retrospective meeting, make notes on what needs to be done in a different way next time;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe collect all successful cases so that we could promptly offer ready-made solutions to the project - we put them into the menu on KB;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe status is updated in Trello and the deadline is indicated.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5095,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7192237a-5ebb-42bd-b8f2-f59167fc2ee6/08Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7192237a-5ebb-42bd-b8f2-f59167fc2ee6/08Capture.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"08Capture.PNG\",\"name\":\"08Capture.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7192237a-5ebb-42bd-b8f2-f59167fc2ee6\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":425,\"height\":44},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We discuss either the final debriefing, or we review the work plan and set new deadlines. To do this, it is better to arrange a separate meeting;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe monitor changes in the project indicators within the agreed period. We record changes in metrics from the moment we start our work until the request is closed;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe discuss what managers are going to do based on the results of the work, what people will be responsible, what will be the deadlines, whether our support will be needed there or not;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAnalytics, depending on the initial request, is carried out later (whether attrition has decreased, whether staffing has accelerated, whether the interaction of teams has changed after team building or not). To do this, we conduct a HealthCheck or a Survey;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe status in Trello changes to Â«doneÂ».\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
